text:
Hay
Twenty-ninth
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNC
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City
Dear Novik:
On this date I took the liberty of sending
the attached telegram to Senator A. B. Adams,
Chairman of the United States Senate Aoprop-
riatlons Committee, on behalf of the Office
of Education and its radio activities. I
also sent each committee member a copy of
this telegram by air mail.
Cordially,
FES/rep
Enclosure
Frank E. Schooley
